repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: U.S. Congressional Hearings on the Plumb Plan on Microfiche
did.abstract: Materials on U.S. Congressional hearings regarding federal ownership of American railroad via the Plumb Plan.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: U.S. Congressional Hearings on the Plumb Plan on Microfiche #5708m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Former title: "U.S. Congressional Hearings (Senate Library) 41st-73rd Congress. 1869-1934; U.S. Congress. House, 1919-1920. Plumb Plan."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of microfiche copies of materials from U.S. Congressional hearings regarding federal ownership of American railroads known as the Plumb Plan. From the Congressional Record, volumes 232 and 233, 66th Congress, 1919-1921.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

did.unittitle: U.S. Congressional hearings regarding the Plumb Plan

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Microfiche copies of volumes 232 and 233 of the U.S. Congressional Hearings for the 41st-73 Congress, 1869-1934.
